text: Varachha Marg assembly constituency (વરાછા માર્ગ વિધાનસભા બેઠક) is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Surat district. This seat came into existence after 2008 delimitation. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments, # Surat City Taluka (Part) – Surat Municipal Corporation (Part) Ward No. – 28, 43, 44, 45. ==Total Number of Voters== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/PCAC.pdf {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 328 || 161420 || 141244 || 5 || 302669 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2012 - Kishorbhai Kanani, Bharatiya Janata Party *2017 - Kishorbhai Kanani, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2012=== http://ceo.gujarat.gov.in/download/Detail_Report_AC2012.pdf ==References== ==See also== List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly Gujarat Legislative Assembly Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Surat
title: Varachha Marg
